00010 #include <QWidget>
00011 #include <QString>
00012 #include <QPushButton>

00014 #include <QCoreApplication>

00016 RenameDialog::RenameDialog(QWidget* parent):
00017 QMessageBox(QMessageBox::Warning,
00018                 QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00019                 tr("text"),
00020                 QMessageBox::NoButton,
00021                 parent,
00022                 Qt::Dialog | Qt::MSWindowsFixedSizeDialogHint ), yesButton_(0),
00023                 cancelButton_(0), renameButton_(0) {
00024 
00025         // add the buttons and connect them to appropriate handlers
00026         yesButton_ = addButton(tr("Yes"), QMessageBox::YesRole);
00027         connect(yesButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00028                         this, SLOT(onYesClicked()));
00029 
00030         cancelButton_ = addButton(tr("Cancel"), QMessageBox::RejectRole);
00031         connect(cancelButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00032                         this, SLOT(onCancelClicked()));
00033 
00034         renameButton_ = addButton(tr("Rename"), QMessageBox::ApplyRole);
00035         connect(renameButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00036                         this, SLOT(onRenameClicked()));
00037 
00038         return;
00039 }
00040 
00041 RenameDialog::~RenameDialog() {
00042         if (yesButton_) {
00043                 delete yesButton_;
00044         }
00045         if (cancelButton_) {
00046                 delete cancelButton_;
00047         }
00048         if (renameButton_) {
00049                 delete renameButton_;
00050         }
00051         return;
00052 }
00053 
00054 // event handler when user clicks "yes"
00055 void RenameDialog::onYesClicked() {
00056         selected_ = RenameDialog::YES;
00057 }
00058 
00059 // event handler when user clicks "cancel"
00060 void RenameDialog::onCancelClicked() {
00061         selected_ = RenameDialog::CANCEL;
00062 }
00063 
00064 // event handler when user clicks "rename"
00065 void RenameDialog::onRenameClicked() {
00066         selected_ = RenameDialog::RENAME;
00067 }
00068 
00069 RenameDialog::ClickedButton RenameDialog::clickedButton() {
00070         return selected_;
00071 }
